news.title: Cornerstone set to reboot with ₹1,700-crore funding from Kotak and land sale
news.para: Cornerstone is planning to raise ₹1,700 crore from Kotak Alternate Asset Managers and monetize land to fund expansion and stalled projects. This move aims to resolve a financial dispute with L&T Finance, stemming from loans sanctioned between 2017 and 2019.

news.title: Over 400 slums in Nagpur legalised
news.para: Out of these 426, 15 are under NMC jurisdiction, 50 under the state govt, 69 under NIT, and 106 under multiple other agencies among others.

news.title: Bengaluru: Home buyers protest against Shapoorji Pallonji Group over project delay
news.para: The home buyers said that KRERA made them sign settlement agreements to get the flats by September 2024, but the builder failed to deliver the flats to the home buyers who have already paid 90 per cent of the amount.

news.title: Chennai: 304 survey numbers found in Pallikaranai Marsh Ramsar site
news.para: The report, prepared with satellite data and e-governance records, was submitted during a hearing in a suo motu case initiated in July 2023.

news.title: Kolkata civic body focuses on height of buildings in flight path
news.para: These guidelines are based on the AAI's colour coded zoning maps (CCZM) and dictate permissible building heights within specific zones. Construction exceeding the permissible heights requires an NoC from AAI.

news.title: Relief for 4,000 buyers as Noida authority approves co-developer for four Supertech projects
news.para: The clearance paves the way for Apex Group to step in and revive The Romano in Sector 118, North Eye and Cape Town in Sector 74, and Eco City in Sector 137.

news.title: Lucknow police arrests individual for duping over 100 people
news.para: The arrest took place on June 15 near Jyotinagar, when the STF received intelligence that Upadhyay would be visiting his now-defunct office near Kanha Upvan in Mohanlalganj to retrieve documents.

news.title: US homebuilder Lennar's posts $8.38 billion revenue in second quarter
news.para: Lennar posted second quarter revenue of $8.38 billion, above analysts' estimate of $8.16 billion, according to data compiled by LSEG.

news.title: Godrej Properties acquires 16-acre land parcel in Upper Kharadi, Pune
news.para: The development on this land will primarily comprise premium group housing and high-street retail. The project has a developable potential of 2.5 million sq ft with an estimated revenue potential of ₹3,100 crore.

news.title: Macrotech Developers changes company's name to Lodha Developers
news.para: In a regulatory filing, Macrotech Developers said, "the Registrar of Companies, Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), has approved the change in name of the Company from 'Macrotech Developers Limited' to 'Lodha Developers Limited' with effect from June 16, 2025.

news.title: Asking prices for UK homes drop 0.3% in June: Rightmove
news.para: Prices dropped by 0.3% compared with a month earlier in Rightmove's June period, which ran from May 11 to June 7. This was the biggest drop since June 2011 and compared with a typical 0.4% rise for the period, the property website said.

news.title: Omaxe acquires 260 acres of land in Punjab
news.para: "In the future, we also see the opportunity to expand this township through new land acquisitions," said Mohit Goel, managing director of Omaxe.

news.title: Debt recovery in stressed realty projects to rise 1,600 bps in FY26
news.para: This uptrend is being fueled by renewed sales momentum in previously stalled housing projects, many of which are back on track thanks to strategic debt restructuring initiatives by asset reconstruction companies (ARCs).

news.title: UltraTech must sell 7% stake in India Cements to meet minimum public shareholding rules
news.para: UltraTech Cement, the new promoter of India Cements, needs to reduce its stake by 7%, worth Rs 667 crore, to comply with SEBI's minimum public shareholding norms. They have until February 2026 to meet the 25% public ownership requirement through various methods.

news.title: Nagpur civic body's rebate scheme boosts property tax collection by 28% in first 2.5 months
news.para: By June 11, FY 2025-26, NMC collected Rs45.33 crore from 1.16 lakh property owners, up from Rs35.47 crore collected from 85,581 taxpayers during the same period last year.

news.title: Four-month sand mining ban in Bihar to protect rivers
news.para: Deputy CM Vijay Kumar Sinha, who also oversees the mines and geology portfolio, said on Sunday, "The sand mining will resume after monsoon. However, there will be no shortage of sand. I have asked the officials to keep a track on anyone demanding more than the prescribed rate and punish them."

news.title: Nagpur: Land titles distributed to 500 Mihan-hit Khapri families
news.para: Out of 765 eligible beneficiaries in Khapri, 500 received pattas (land ownership documents). The remaining 265 are expected to receive theirs soon. The function was held on the premises of a school at the rehabilitated layout in Mihan.

news.title: Haryana housing board’s future uncertain as state government plans its merger into HSVP
news.para: The Housing Board, established in 1971 to provide affordable homes on a no-profit-no-loss basis, has long served economically weaker sections, low-income families, and the lower middle class.

news.title: GNIDA offers housing plots near Noida airport, one costs ₹152 crore
news.para: The Authority has put three prime plots on the auction block through e-bidding — 18,215sqm in Sector Mu with a reserve price of Rs 97 crore, a 30,000sqm plot in Sigma III with a reserve price of Rs 152 crore, and a 3,999sqm land parcel in Alpha II with a base price of Rs 25 crore.
